title: Toastmasters For Those Who Stutter
teaser: A Nashville public speaking club is geared specifically to help people who have a stutter overcome their fears.
contentencoded:
To overcome your fears, face them head on. That’s the conventional wisdom, anyway. If you’re frightened of public speaking, then get up and give a speech.

But what if every time you talk there are moments when your face and throat tense up and your voice gets stuck on a single sound? From the Here & Now Contributors Network, Nina Cardova of WPLN reports on one new group forming in Nashville.
